pre_caption: The video presents a wide shot of a black sports car drifting on an expansive asphalt track. Initially, the car is positioned slightly off-center towards the left in the foreground, with the camera capturing it from above. As the car drifts, it moves dynamically across the frame, transitioning from the left to the right side while maintaining its presence in the foreground. The car's orientation shifts, revealing different angles of its sleek design. The white smoke trails behind the car, expanding from the bottom right towards the center of the frame. The surrounding arid, rocky terrain forms the background, remaining static as the car maneuvers. The camera maintains a consistent height above the car, providing a clear overhead view of the drifting action and the track's surface. The shot size remains wide throughout, ensuring the car and its movement remain the focal point against the open backdrop.
